alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garfield and west central McCone Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Rock Creek Rec Area to 6 miles northeast of Nelson Creek Rec Area. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Creek Rec Area and Haxby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
